auth.title: Code Awareness
auth.checkYourEmail: Email sent. Please check your email to create a new password.
auth.passwordAssist: We'll send you an email with instructions on how to change your password.
auth.passRequirements: At least one number and one letter. Minimum 8 characters.
auth.resetPasswordWithEmail: Please type your account email address, to reset your password.
auth.signUpWithEmail: Please create an account with your email and a password

invites.title: You can now send the following link(s) to your peers:
invites.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this share? Your peers will be disconnected from this share.

options.nameDuplication: Cannot have two groups with the same name
options.orphanFile: This file is not part of a repository
options.setupInfo: You may choose to split the share between several groups. You send one link to each group. Users of the same group can see each other's files, but only the originator (yourself) has visibility over all the groups.
options.setupFolder: Sharing the parent Folder of the current file

shared.instructions: The file will be downloaded and opened in a new window. Please open CodeAwareness addon in that new window.
shared.shareInfo: Paste your invitation link here and CodeAwareness will download the resource shared with you, and setup the collaboration environment in the folder indicated.

sync.intro: Please copy and paste the code above into the browser window:

users.noPeers: There are no contributors to this file

context.noItems: No context items on this file
